summary:
I am a dedicated teacher of English with almost 30 years experience in the English language teaching world. My experience covers primary and secondary schools in Australia and a variety of secondary schools in The Netherlands. I am particularly interested in Formative Assessment and have conducted research in this field and  have delivered a research paper. Whilst working on the implementation of Formative Assessment, I am also focussing on developing my expertise on Testing and am a certified Test Expert. I have completed a recent course and am now a certified Coach. 

I thoroughly enjoy encouraging students to reach their goals by setting them achievable targets and guiding them along the way. It is a privilege to be able to pass on knowledge to the next generation.  It is extremely rewarding to see students obtain good results through hard work.

My passion for teaching English extends beyond secondary education. I also have experience in teaching Business English. For a number of years I worked for an international language institute, providing tailored individual training designed to match the specific needs of individual participants as well as group training on specific areas of business. 

Areas which I have covered are: English for meetings, negotiations and presentations. I also have experience in delivering writing skills courses and English for PAs and secretaries.
